patterns: How many major that Binus provide
responses:
ACCOUNTING & FINANCE: Accounting, Finance
ART & DESIGN: Film, interior design(@Malang), Visual Communication Design - New Media, Interior Design, Visual Communication Design - Animation, Visual Communication Design, Visual Communication Design(@Bandung), Interior Design(@Bandung), Visual Communication Design(@Malang)
Business: Business Creation, Entrepreneurship - Business Creation(@Malang), Management, Business Management, Global Business Marketing, Creativepreneurship(@Bandung), International Business Management
Communication: Communication - Marketing Communication, Communication - Mass Communication, Communication(@Malang), Public Relation(@Malang)
Computing: Business Analytics, Computer Science(@Bandung), Data Science, Information Systems Accounting And Auditing, Business Information Technology,Computer Science (@Malang), Game Application And Technology, Mobile Application and Technology, Computer Science, Cyber Security, Information Systems
Engineering: Architecture, Food Technology, Civil Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Computer Engineering
Hospitality And Tourism: Business HoteManagement(Diploma Program), Hotel Management(Diploma Program), Tourism
Humanities: Chinese Literature, Japanese Literature, Psychology, English Literature, Law - Business Law, International Relations, Primary Teacher Education
